Description.Name: Main Med Bay
Description.Details: The medical facilities on the Argo are fantastic, Sir! There are approximately six beds to treat any injured Mechwarriors. However, there is a lot of room for improvement, as the rest of the medical facilities must have sustained major damage during the initial crash of the Argo. The medical bay is located in the center of the rotating hub. Sir, you will have to invest a lot of C-Bills to get this facility to its original state. There is a monthly cost that includes medical supplies and MedTech salaries. We will start with 8 MedTechs.
